name: Nightmares! (luumi)
description:
you're a sleepy little wizard, and you've woken up inside a nightmare! can you survive the onslaught of toys and make it to dawn?

a little shoot-em-up horror game/audio demo made with Unity and Wwise.

this game was provided as a template by Berklee's Game Audio with Wwise course. in addition to composing, recording, mixing, and implementing all sound effects and music, I also made significant updates to the visual effects and gamefeel, as well as minor updates to gameplay itself.
